item.description:
Dear meditators...because you are interested in higher conscousness, you might be interested in this program happening at A Higher Balance....I hope to see you there!

Divine Openings Program
Thursday, June 7, 7-9 PM $35
This program is for anyone interested in accessing and sustaining higher consciousness.
We will enter sacred ceremony to lift our hearts and energy fields for chakra illumination and meditation. You will receive three Divine Openings and learn about ways to open and sustain freedom through higher vibrations.
     Divine Openings is an enlightenment activation. No matter where you are on your path of awakening, you will love this sacred way of being in divine energy! Whatever you want next in life, this program will help you achieve it with ease and grace. The Divine Presence becomes apparent as divine love and joy.
Judy will base this program on the book Everything is Going Great in my Absence by Lola Jones and her ongoing deep studies in the area of conscious awakening. She was initiated by Lola to give Divine Openings in May at Lola's five-day retreat.
     This inaugural program is the start of what will be a community of those wanting to live in a state of higher consciousness. Our meetings will be a way to freely express and connect with like hearted souls. Lola's book is available through Judy.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Divine Openings Program
